display_name: Filtered: Overall RDI at 3% desat or arousal
description: RDI with Arousals at 3% desat  [(Total number of apneas and hypopneas with arousal associated with >= 3% desat) / (hours of sleep)]
calculations: 60*(hremba3 +hroa3 + hnrba3 + hnroa3 +carba3+ caroa3 + canba3 + canoa3 + oarba3 + oaroa3 + oanba3 + oanoa3 + marbpa3 + maropa3 + manrbpa3 + manropa3) / slpprdp
